questions: What are the top technologies that companies in the healthcare sector are hiring for based on their job postings? (Tables: CompanyHiringDetail, CompanyTechStack, CompanyInfo)
Which companies have recent leadership changes and also signed new vendor deals in the past year? (Tables: CompanyLeadershipExcerpt, CompanyDealMaster, CompanyInfo)
What topics did data scientists discuss in their most recent LinkedIn posts across various industries? (Tables: PersonaLinkedinPost, PersonaUser, PersonaTitle)
Which social media platforms are most frequently mentioned by companies that are shifting their focus area towards AI technologies? (Tables: SocialMediaInfo, CompanyFocusAreaDetail, CompanyInfo)

What are the common traits of companies that have both increased their investment in cybersecurity and experienced recent positive business trends? (Tables: CompanyDealMaster, IndustryBusinessTrend, CompanyTechStack)
Which organizations have engaged heavily on Twitter about cloud infrastructure after announcing their latest funding rounds? (Tables: PersonaTwitterTweets, CompanyInfo, CompanyDealMaster)
How do the IT partner strategies of companies with significant digital transformation projects correlate with their technology stack? (Tables: CompanyITPartnerDetail, CompanyTechStack, CompanyInfo)

What insights can be drawn about the hiring trends for data scientists in companies that frequently post on social media regarding new technologies? (Tables: CompanyHiringDetail, SocialMediaInfo, PersonaUser)
Which vendors are most commonly associated with companies that discuss machine learning in leadership excerpts? (Tables: CompanyLeadershipExcerpt, CompanyDealMaster, CompanyInfo)
What technology investments have been made by companies in the manufacturing sector that are also expanding their social media presence? (Tables: CompanyTechStack, CompanyInfo, SocialMediaInfo)

PersonaLinkedinActivity.text: After more than 2 wonderful years at VMware, it gives me immense pleasure to share that I have taken on a new role at Microsoft as a Software Engineer! Looking forward to this new experience.

Dr Vivek Talaulikar Appointed as Director & Chief Operating Officer - Western Region Max Healthcare 
Earlier Chief Operating Officer IHH Healthcare.


Follow Vishal Pandey 🇮🇳 for more news & updates

He founded a unicorn. Got bored. Now, he wants to digitise 60,000+ hospitals.

Rizwan Koita—who rode the Obamacare wave as Citiustech CEO—is plumbing Indian healthcare as NABH chairman. He agrees that health services options “should be like Zomato”.

Seema Singh reports.

Read the full story here: https://lnkd.in/gsYhFxDp

Human Possibilities a platform that connects you with Global Leadership Trends in collaboration with Rxcruit Advisors, a leading Global Executive Search Firm is pleased to share the inspiring video of Dr Kousar Shah  Senior Vice President, Max Healthcare as part of the Leadership Insights Initiative. In this intriguing video, he delves into the remarkable journey of success through the power of mantras. With passion and conviction, he shares personal anecdotes and insights into how embracing mantras has been a transformative force in his life. From overcoming obstacles to achieving goals, the video explores the profound impact of incorporating mantras into daily routines. He inspires people with his genuine enthusiasm and authenticity by discussing the tangible results and positive shifts that manifest when one embraces the potential of these ancient, empowering phrases. Whether you're seeking motivation, inner peace, or simply curious about the profound influence of mantras, this video promises to be an enlightening exploration into the keys of success that lie within the power of words.

Click the link to watch complete video: https://lnkd.in/dqKReuZp

https://www.rxcruit.com/

It gives me great pleasure to announce the release of the latest (8th) Edition of Sutton’s Text Book of Radiology and Imaging, by Elsevier.

The new Edition was launched at a function hosted earlier this month in New Delhi, by Mr Abhay Soi, Chairman & Managing Director of Max Healthcare Institute Limited, as Chief Guest. Dr Mradul Kaushik, Senior Director & COO Cluster 1 at Max Healthcare, Mr Shanker Kaul, Managing Director at Elsevier, Dr Amit Disawal, secretary ICRI; and Dr Deepak Gupta & Dr Ankur Goyal, President & Secretary of Delhi state Branch of IRIA were the guests of honour at the launch.

It has been an honour and privilege for me to lead the revision of this book, which was last updated in 2002. The book has been the gold standard and key reference book in Radiology. The new Sutton is aimed at recreating an exhaustive resource for radiologists to solve diverse clinical scenarios using the latest and most appropriate techniques.  

The book was put together through the COVID pandemic, the biggest medical calamity faced by our generation. I extend my heartfelt gratitude to all the contributors, who, despite being personally and professionally impacted by COVID at the frontlines during the pandemic, stood true to their commitment and contributed high quality material that will lay the foundation for the careers of the radiologists of the future.

I thank my associate Editors, Dr.Amit Kumar Sahu, Dr.Akshay Baheti & Dr. Varsha Joshi for their support and hard work. Our team had the privilege to work with some of the top Radiology educationists as our Section editors, all leaders in their fields - a big thanks to Dr.Suresh K. Mukherji MD MBA FACR, Dr.Suyash Mohan, Dr.Girish Gandikota, Dr.Sandeep Hedgire, Dr.Mukesh Harisinghani, Dr.Sujit Vaidya, Dr.Puneet Bhargava, MD, FAUR, FSAR, FACR & Dr.Subba Digumarthy for their contribution. 

I once again thank all the contributors, my family and my colleagues at Max Healthcare for their support!

#SuttonRadiologyTextbook, #Radiology #RadiologyEduction #maxhealthcare #ai

PersonaMisc.Personality: {"trait1":"Neeraj tends to be pragmatic, independent, and logical when making decisions","trait2":"He often prefers to minimize unknowns, striving to understand the rationale behind how everything works.","trait3":"Neeraj tends to be a highly-focused executer at work who gets right to the point in a conversation","trait4":"He may often ask precise questions and is likely to enjoy digging into the specifics in order to make decisions.","trait5":"Neeraj tends to be direct in verbalizing concerns and likely will not leave anything open to interpretation","trait6":"He tends to search for a point in every conversation and would prefer to get right to it, rather than needing to weed through the unnecessary details","personality1":3,"personality2":4,"personality3":4,"personality4":2,"personality5":2,"personality6":1,"personality7":1,"personality8":3}

PersonaMisc.Communication: {"call":{"1":"Be prepared for pushback","2":"Don't get offended if they ends the conversation abruptly","3":"Stay objective rather than emotional","4":"Avoid bringing up unrelated information","5":"Share your qualifications or expertise"},"meet":{"1":"Keep it formal and business-like","2":"Come in prepared for any question","3":"Minimize the amount of open-ended questions","4":"Address necessary details","5":"Use facts and figures to maintain accuracy"},"email":{"1":"Be prepared to provide data and evidence","2":"Expect heavy skepticism","3":"Know why you're better than your competitors","4":"Prove your skill or expertise","5":"Be honest and direct about what you're offering"},"collaborate":{"1":"Support any claims with proof","2":"Offer blunt constructive criticism","3":"Process conflict logically","4":"Listen to their suggestions for improving efficiency","5":"Maintain high standards for your work"},"behavior":{"1":"Doubting the authenticity of an advertisement or sales pitch","2":"Questioning a lack of logic and analysis","3":"Making decisions based purely on logic","4":"Feeling annoyed by an exaggeration","5":"Valuing accuracy above most things"},"motivation":{"1":"Embracing difficult tasks","2":"Guiding and leading teams ","3":"Eliminating waste and inefficiency","4":"Advancing in career development","5":"Striving for competitive success "},"drainer":{"1":"Taking on an unclear task","2":"Expressive displays of emotion","3":"Failing to meet deadlines","4":"Indecision from others","5":"Working at sluggish speed "}}

We believe that this transaction will be crucial in showcasing India's growth story to the world at large","Topic":"Axis Bank's Milestone","link":"https://www.cnbctv18.com/finance/axis-bank-raises-600-million-through-at1-bonds-pricing-at-410-percent-10593521.htm"},{"Description":"The second aspect of NIMs (net interest margins) is that the deposit repricing is still continuing in the system. PersonaMisc.Personality:
{"trait1":"Sri is pragmatic, rational and deliberate by ideas, who likes to have best possible outcomes in his work
","trait2":"He feels angsty when dealing with emotionally charged issues and prefers staying out of the loop when big decisions are being made
","trait3":"Sri is a truly well-organized leader and addresses problems with head-on, rather than tiptoeing around them
","trait4":"He tends to be frustrated by a lack of reliable, unproven information and meeting lots of new people at once 
","trait5":"Sri feels energized by having specific order and organization around him and maintaining accuracy & precision
","trait6":"He enjoys thorough spreadsheets and experimenting with many solutions to a problem
","personality1":"2","personality2":"4","personality3":"3","personality4":"2","personality5":"5","personality6":"3","personality7":"2","personality8":"4"}

PersonaMisc.Communication: {"call":{"1":"Keep it succinct","2":"Get right to the issue at hand","3":"Use words like \"done\" and \"absolutely\"","4":"Avoid bringing up unrelated information"},"meet":{"1":"Prove that you did your research","2":"Set a clear end time","3":"Focus on action items","4":"Address necessary details"},"email":{"1":"Demonstrate the quality of what you're offering","2":"Get to the point quickly","3":"Avoid too much hype","4":"Prove your skill or expertise"},"collaborate":{"1":"Stay focused on the task at hand","2":"Know that he prefers working alone","3":"Don't be afraid to ask tough questions","4":"Listen to his suggestions for improving efficiency"},"behavior":{"1":"Verbally challenging a bold claim about a product","2":"Challenging ideas that don't make sense","3":"Questioning inefficient practices","4":"Pausing a conversation to correct something inaccurate"},"motivation":{"1":"Valuing autonomy in decision-making and actions","2":"Needing uninterrupted time and respectful physical boundaries","3":"Working quickly while maintaining high efficiency standards","4":"Offering constructive and timely performance-related feedback"},"drainer":{"1":"Waiting for extended periods of time","2":"Inefficiencies and waste","3":"Long conversations with an unclear objective","4":"Indecision from others"}}

PersonaMisc.Speaks: {"Personal":[],"Professional":[{"link":"https://www.business-standard.com/companies/news/hdfc-bank-targets-personalised-experiences-to-boost-deposit-mobilisation-124080901113_1.html","Description":"Raising the bar on customer service and improving customer journeys remain a key priority. PersonaMisc.Personality: {"trait1":"Sashidhar tends to be decisive, forward-thinking, and spontaneous with a natural aversion to rigid structure. ","trait2":"He tends to have more confidence in gut instinct than formal structure, which can lead to bold but unpredictable decisions. ","trait3":"Sashidhar is likely to thrive in chaos, with a preference for shaping new ideas and taking calculated risks. ","trait4":"He tends to communicate boldly and think out loud, especially in front of a group. ","trait5":"Sashidhar tends to be outgoing and decisive, with a preference for shaping new ideas over analyzing existing ones. ","trait6":"He highly prioritizes time efficiency over unnecessary small talk, ensuring that interactions are focused and purposeful","personality1":2,"personality2":3,"personality3":2,"personality4":2,"personality5":4,"personality6":3,"personality7":2,"personality8":4}
PersonaMisc.OrgHierarchy: {"self":{"name":"Sashidhar Jagdishan","designation":"Managing Director & Chief Executive Officer","image":"ee405941-ccc1-4cbc-9501-4707c2d50348_Sashidhar-Jagdishan-1-770x433-1.png","url":"https://www.hdfcbank.com/personal/about-us/overview/board-of-director"},"reports":{"name":"Atanu Chakraborty","designation":"Part-time Chairman and Independent Director","image":"c32e4885-5110-4422-b431-d3bff7c9c4f1_Atanu.png","url":"https://www.hdfcbank.com/personal/about-us/overview/board-of-director"},"reporting":[{"name":"Srinivasan Vaidyanathan","designation":"Chief Financial Officer / Group Head Finance","image":"a7c3a147-06ce-4991-b8bb-eaf1cc8adf03_Srinivasan.png","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/srinivasan-vaidyanathan-1027735/"},{"name":"Ramesh Lakshminarayanan","designation":"CIO , Group Head -Tech & Digital","image":"d51b7013-dccc-4935-8b49-e3d36a87e91c_Ramesh.png","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/ramesh-lakshminarayanan-8ab67b10/"}]}
PersonaMisc.Communication: {"call":{"1":"Be less polished and more dynamic ","2":"Stick to the big picture","3":"Tell a few jokes","4":"Emphasize the future","5":"Use visual aids when possible"},"meet":{"1":"Remain upbeat and positive","2":"Use whiteboards and/or visual aids when possible","3":"Start by casting an exciting vision","4":"Expect him to be a couple of minutes late","5":"Show confidence and enthusiasm"},"email":{"1":"Discuss next steps","2":"Ask about his vision for the future","3":"Turn on the charm","4":"Use surprises to get his attention","5":"Match his energy"},"collaborate":{"1":"Set ambitious team goals","2":"Hit the ground running on a new project","3":"Don't assign him to routine tasks","4":"Help him remain realistic","5":"Let him take the lead"},"behavior":{"1":"Taking big risks","2":"Speaking persuasively in a one-on-one meeting","3":"Elevating new ideas","4":"Leading the conversation in a meeting","5":"Finding ways around the rules"},"motivation":{"1":"Quickly thinking and reacting under pressure","2":"Frequently experiencing new and exciting things","3":"Numerous opportunities to perform and entertain","4":"Confidently engaging in public speaking","5":"Presenting bold and innovative ideas"},"drainer":{"1":"Thoroughly researching and analyzing data","2":"Engaging in repetitive and routine tasks","3":"Strictly following numerous established rules","4":"Adhering to rigid and inflexible schedules","5":"Experiencing limited freedom and independence"}}

PersonaMisc.Speaks: {"Personal":[],"Professional":[{"Description":"We are creating two factories—the enterprise factory and the digital factory—to be able to build new architecture, new designs on the cloud, which will ensure that we are able to compete with the fintechs and the platform players","Topic":"Cloud-Powered Innovation","link":"https://www.businesstoday.in/interactive/immersive/hdfc-bank-ceo-sashidhar-jagdishan/"},{"link":"https://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/aim-to-double-every-four-years-hdfc-bank-md-sashidhar-jagdishan-after-merger-10888081.html","Description":"The runway for financial services and mortgage, which are so underserved and under penetrated, is going to be very large. HDFC Bank - the combined entity - with a large and growing distribution and customer franchise, more than adequate capital, healthy asset quality and profitability, will be best positioned to capture growth. The pace at which we aim to grow - we could be creating a new HDFC Bank every 4 years","Topic":"Financial Opportunities"},{"Description":"Digitalization offers customers unparalleled convenience and access to banking services. With these conveniences comes a lot of risks of cyber frauds as well. The fraudsters are constantly on the prowl looking out for gullible customers. It is critical to be always alert and mindful of talking and chatting with strangers. Customers need to protect their wealth and savings by following certain hygiene rules. For example don’t pick up unknown calls; Don’t click on SMS and mails from strangers. Don’t share OTP, card numbers, passwords or PINS  etc.","link":"https://www.mediainfoline.com/advertising/hdfc-bank-launches-2nd-edition-of-mooh-band-rakho-campaign","Topic":"Risks of Digital Banking"},{"link":"https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/banking/finance/banking/things-at-hdfc-werent-going-according-to-plan-post-merger-says-md-ceo-sashidhar-jagdishan/articleshow/112420313.cms?from=mdr","Description":"It is in economic interest of the institution, to try and ensure that the deposit growth is much greater than the credit growth, and even if it means for a period of time, we have to slow down credit growth. We can then enjoy the benefits of the cycle moving back upwards at the appropriate time. The branch is wonderful platform to engage with customers. You will still see bank branches in New York and London","Topic":"Balancing Deposits and Credit"},{"link":"https://www.businesstoday.in/industry/banks/story/hdfc-bank-merger-ceo-sashidhar-jagdishan-bank-to-focus-on-profitable-growth-bring-down-credit-to-deposit-ratio-to-pre-merger-levels-437726-2024-07-18","Description":"The merger has presented the Bank with a massive opportunity which we’re working to seize. India is today in the midst of unprecedented urbanisation, fuelled by rising incomes and aspirations cutting across metros and beyond. The merger has opened up fresh vistas for growth through the mortgage business, not only through increase in home loan disbursals, but also by leveraging customer engagement with the cross-sell opportunities across the HDFC Bank Group. The Bank has exhibited robust and consistent double-digit, year-onyear growth across its Home Loan business for the first nine months, post the merger. On a sequential basis too, it has gained a leading position recording a growth of 4 per cent","Topic":"Merger-Driven Growth Opportunities"},{"link":"https://www.thehindubusinessline.com/money-and-banking/as-focus-shifts-to-growth-cd-ratio-moderation-unlikely-to-be-very-steep-in-fy26-hdfc-bank-md/article69469020.ece","Description":"Our CD ratio has been brought down from the highs at the time of the merger (of erstwhile HDFC with the bank) — around 110 per cent — to about 96 per cent as of March 2025. Our deposits have grown faster than the system, and our loans as well. Next year, in line with what we committed, the adjustment in CD ratio will not be so steep, supporting loan growth for the bank, though it will remain on a downward path\n","Topic":"Balancing Growth Prudently"},{"link":"https://www.republicworld.com/business/hdfc-bank-on-rbi-rate-cuts-loans-to-get-cheaper-soon-bank-says-absolutely-but-heres-the-catch","Description":"RBI has recently commenced cutting rates… The change in stance from neutral to accommodative is a welcome relief to all of us. Corporates have adopted a wait-and-watch stance, and we are waiting for more clarity… We remain watchful","Topic":"Awaiting Policy Clarity"}]}
PersonaMisc.Pitch: {"Pitch":[{"Prompt":"No Information Available","Description":"Suggest Digital Transformation and Innovation Solutns including AI-Driven Customer Engagement Platforms, Omnichannel Banking Solutions and Blockchain for Banking Operations to streamline secure transactions, ensure data integrity, analyze customer behavior and enable seamless banking across digital and physical channels.\nOffer Finance and Risk Optimization Solutions that encompass Advanced Analytics for Risk Management, Real-Time Financial Dashboards and RegTech Solutions to enhance credit risk evaluation, fraud detection, compliance monitoring and provide assistance in monitoring KPIs across finance, treasury, and business operations for proactive decision-making. "}],"Social Media Engagement":[{"Prompt":"No Information Available","Description":"Sashidhar is not present on LinkedIn.\n"}],"ICEBREAKERS":[{"Prompt":"No Information Available","Description":"Initiate a conversation about his interest in cooking, music, reading and cycling"}],"MEETING":[{"Prompt":"test","Description":"No Information Available"}]}

PersonaMisc.Article: {"Articles":[{"name":"CSR 2019-20: HDFC increases CSR spend by 20%; Spends Rs 535 Crore","Description":"The Bank’s CSR efforts are led by a CSR committee headed by Umesh Chandra Sarangi who is also an independent director in company","OnDate":"Aug 2020","link":"https://thecsruniverse.com/articles/csr-2019-20-hdfc-increases-csr-spend-by-20-spends-rs-535-crore"}]}
PersonaMisc.Event: {"Events":[{"Name":"Material Events under Schedule III","Description":"In this event, Mr. Umesh Chandra Sarangi was Re-appointed as an Independent Director of the Bank","OnDate":"Jul 2021","link":"http://pdf.secdatabase.com/1101/0001193125-21-221327.pdf"}],"News":[{"Name":"HDFC Bank reappoints Mr. Umesh Chandra Sarangi as an independent director","Description":"The Board of Directors of HDFC Bank Ltd, at its meeting, has duly approved the re-appointment of Mr. Umesh Chandra Sarangi (DIN: 02040436) as an Independent Director on the Board of the Bank for the period commencing from March 1, 2021, till February 5, 2022, i.e. till he completes 70 years of age, as per the Banking Regulation Act, 1949, and relevant RBI circulars","OnDate":"Nov 2020","link":"https://www.equitybulls.com/admin/news2006/news_det.asp?id=278908"},{"Name":"Employees and retired employees of Nabard observe one-day strike; seek pension updation","Description":"The past chairmen and managing directors of the development financial institution wrote the letter a month back but there was no progress on the matter","OnDate":"Mar 2021","link":"https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/wealth/personal-finance-news/employees-and-retired-employees-of-nabard-observe-one-day-strik-seek-pension-updation/articleshow/81757291.cms"},{"Name":"HDFC Bank board declares dividend of Rs 6.5 per share for FY 2020-21","Description":"HDFC Bank on Friday said its board has declared a dividend of Rs 6.50 per share for the year ended March 2021, Besides, the board approved revising the re-appointment of Umesh Chandra Sarangi as an independent director from March 1, 2021 till February 29, 2024","OnDate":"Jun 2021","link":"https://www.newindianexpress.com/business/2021/jun/19/hdfc-bank-board-declares-dividend-of-rs-65per-share-for-fy-2020-21-2318554.html"},{"Name":"Annual pay in FY20: HDFC Bank MD Aditya Puri’s Rs 18.9 crore vs SBI Chairman Rajnish Kumar’s Rs 31 lakh","Description":"Malay Patel drew the second highest among independent directors at Rs 43.5 lakh, followed by Umesh Chandra Sarangi (Rs 31 lakh), Sanjiv Sachar (Rs 33 lakh), Sandeep Parekh (Rs 31 lakh) and M D Ranganath (Rs 36.5 lakh)","OnDate":"June 2020","link":"https://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/annual-pay-in-fy20-hdfc-bank-md-aditya-puris-rs-18-9-crore-vs-sbi-chairman-rajnish-kumars-rs-31-lakh-5455321.html"}]}

PersonaMisc.Article: {"Articles":[{"name":"At HDFC Bank we are a play on the GDP. We don't chase a particular mix, says Kaizad M Bharucha, Executive Director","Description":"Kaizad Bharucha speaks about the HDFC Bank’s business focus, expansion plans, industry trends, competition from state-run rivals, and the new crop of fintechs, which he says are an opportunity, not a threat","OnDate":"16-Sep-2021","link":"https://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/exclusive-interview-at-hdfc-bank-we-are-a-play-on-the-gdp-we-dont-chase-a-particular-mix-says-kaizad-m-bharucha-executive-director-7472721.html"},{"name":"HDFC Bank receives Rs 30000 crore pre payments ","Description":"HDFC Bank received about Rs 30,000 crore in prepayments through the June quarter, primarily from companies in the commodities and infrastructure sectors","OnDate":"11-Aug-2021","link":"https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/industry/banking/finance/banking/hdfc-bank-receives-rs-30000-crore-prepayments-amid-signs-of-economic-recovery-and-deliveraging/articleshow/85182641.cms?from=mdr"},{"name":"HDFC Bank unveils reorganization into three focus areas","Description":"Private sector lender HDFC Bank on Friday announced an internal reorganization that would see it form three distinct focus areas namely, business verticals, delivery channels, and technology","OnDate":"01-May-2021","link":"https://www.livemint.com/industry/banking/hdfc-bank-unveils-reorganization-into-three-focus-areas-11619798187074.html"},{"name":"Hoarding up cash","Description":"HDFC Bank treasurer Ashish Parthasarathy sells share worth Rs 247 million as a stock rellies after its Q2FY21 results","OnDate":"30-Oct-2020","link":"https://www.outlookbusiness.com/markets/trend/hoarding-up-cash-6069"},{"name":"HDFC Bank unveils ‘Project Future – Ready’ for next growth phase","Description":"The bank is preparing Future – Ready teams. This structure will create the necessary strategic and execution agility that needed to serve customers across India & Bharat, Retail, Commercial (MSME) and Corporate segments","OnDate":"1-May-2021","link":"https://www.expresscomputer.in/news/hdfc-bank-unveils-project-future-ready-for-next-growth-phase/75514/"}]}
PersonaMisc.Event: {"Events":[{"Name":"No information available","Description":"","OnDate":"","link":""}],"News":[{"Name":"A behind the scenes look at how Shashi Dhar Jagdishan, The Private lending sector is trying to transform the bank into a technology company","Description":"HDFC Bank’s Mumbai headquarters amidst the raging Covid-19 pandemic was like walking into the Sabina Park cricket pitch in the 1980s and facing a battery of West Indian fast bowlers. That’s how the new MD & CEO of the country’s second-largest bank often recounts his grueling first 11 months to friends and acquaintances","OnDate":"","link":"https://www.businesstoday.in/interactive/immersive/hdfc-bank-ceo-sashidhar-jagdishan/"},{"Name":"Indian retail investors can trade in select US stocks via NSE-IFSC platform","Description":"NSE IFSC has launched trading in unsponsored depositary receipts, which will offer Indian retail investors an opportunity to invest in the US stocks listed on bourses like NYSE and NASDAQ in an easy and affordable way","OnDate":"Mar 2022","link":"https://www.business-standard.com/article/markets/indian-retail-investors-can-trade-in-select-us-stocks-via-nse-ifsc-platform-122030301342_1.html"},{"Name":"HDFC-HDFC Bank merger: Inner circle of 7 kept deal under wraps until end","Description":"A number of key officials within the group were not aware until late Sunday night. A top fund manager with the HDFC group and a top official of the bank said that even they got to know about it only late in the evening","OnDate":"Apr 2022","link":"https://indianexpress.com/article/business/banking-and-finance/hdfc-hdfc-bank-merger-inner-circle-of-7-kept-deal-under-wraps-until-end-7853111/"}]}
PersonaMisc.Speaks: {"Personal":[{"Topic":"No information available","Description":"dummydesc"}],"Professional":[{"Topic":"Corporate loans","Description":"Corporate loans will likely grow selectively, The second wave has not destroyed demand for corporate loans but postponed it. With caseloads falling, companies will require money - both working capital and term loans","link":""},{"Topic":"Projects","Description":"There are several projects we’ve taken up both for improving the existing offerings and bringing about changes in the existing offerings to corporates. The new offering will bring in far more efficiency at the client level; there are a couple of internal projects that will bring in efficiency in our processes","link":""}]}

PersonaMisc.Personality: {"trait1":"Renu tends to be results-focused and likely thrives in a fast-paced environment that encourages risk. ","trait2":"She tends to make decisions quickly and decisively, relying more on intuition and instinct than analysis. ","trait3":"Renu tends to be an enthusiastic adventurer: resentful of formal structures but serious and decisive in execution.","trait4":"She tends to be an extremely direct communicator that makes quick, but calculated decisions. ","trait5":"Renu is likely to be an ambitious and persuasive achiever with a casual and direct communication style. ","trait6":"She enjoys thorough spreadsheets and experimenting with many solutions to a problem","personality1":2,"personality2":4,"personality3":3,"personality4":1,"personality5":4,"personality6":3,"personality7":2,"personality8":4}
PersonaMisc.Communication: {"call":{"1":"Let her take the lead","2":"Share a compelling story","3":"Avoid being quiet or reserved","4":"Project boldness and confidence ","5":"Keep conversation brief"},"meet":{"1":"Send a bulleted list with anything she needs to prepare","2":"Crack a few jokes","3":"Make an effort to meet her goals","4":"Avoid too much formality","5":"Prepare for pushback"},"email":{"1":"Break your pitch up into bite-sized chunks","2":"Keep the discussion high-level","3":"Ask about her goals","4":"Present exciting opportunities","5":"Project confidence"},"collaborate":{"1":"Implement good ideas quickly","2":"Don't be afraid to take risks","3":"Always focus on the team's overall goal","4":"Maintain a fast work pace","5":"Stay focused on the bottom line"},"behavior":{"1":"Working with a sense of urgency","2":"Completing projects more quickly than others","3":"Prioritizing personal career advancement over job security","4":"Building and maintaining momentum","5":"Motivating and driving others to action"},"motivation":{"1":"Numerous opportunities for career advancement","2":"Effectively leading and guiding others","3":"Making swift and decisive decisions","4":"Successfully winning over other people","5":"Pursuing and achieving ambitious goals"},"drainer":{"1":"Engaging excessively in over-planning","2":"Participating in slow, drawn-out events","3":"Consistently failing to achieve goals","4":"Feeling held back by process","5":"Conducting thorough research and analysis"}}

PersonaMisc.Speaks: {"Personal":[{"Topic":"No Information Available","Description":""}],"Professional":[{"Topic":"Elevating Customer Experience with AI/ML","Description":"In our industry, the biggest differentiator is service – how quickly we respond to customers, and how well we understand their needs. We have tonnes of customer data from the past 45 years. Now, with AI/ML and other emerging technologies, we’re able to use that data to elevate the customer experience – be it through 1:1 personalisation or self-service.”","link":"https://www.salesforce.com/in/resources/customer-stories/hdfc-limited/"},{"Topic":"Tech-Driven Customer Experience Evolution","link":"https://newsroom.accenture.com/news/2022/hdfc-ltd-collaborates-with-accenture-to-accelerate-digital-transformation","Description":"“HDFC has a rich legacy of customer centric innovation, and we have always looked to technology as a way of getting closer to our customers. The ongoing market disruption in the mortgage industry calls for a focused commitment to digital-led reinvention of customer experiences, which we believe will be pivotal to driving future growth.”"}]}
